content: I have been reviewing the data elements and descriptions for FHIR Medication Request. I have 'created' some new data descriptions for those that I couldn't find on the FHIR website. Can anyone advise how the highlighted yellow descriptions should be handled? See attached spreadsheet. Thanks. Andrew GledhillHL7-FHIR-descriptions-for-Medication-Request.xlsx

@Andrew Gledhill - Thanks for this mapping list; I've taken your spreadsheet and added my suggestions (guesses) for the HL7 V2.x field mappings. Updated spreadsheet attached: HL7-FHIR-descriptions-for-Medication-Request-HL7V2-Mappings.xlsx

Thanks for your analysis John. I am sure the mappings that you suggest are correct but I am not an HL7 v2 specialist. Accurate mapping tables between HL7 v2 message descriptions/codes and FHIR message descriptions/codes are obviously very important to get right. Will the HL7 FHIR clinical specialist teams (e.g. Pharmacy) be responsible for QC/checking these important mapping tables? Thanks
Andrew, I also updated some of the FHIR MedicationRequest property names too; check those out to see if they make sense.
